sentences.sContent: Give me a big bag and a two-liter of diet Sprite.
sentences.sContent_eng: Give me a big bag and a two-liter of diet Sprite.
sentences.sCn: 给我一包大包的和一瓶两公升的低糖“雪碧”汽水。

sentences.sContent: It takes over three times as much energy to produce a liter of non-organic milk than a liter of organic milk.
sentences.sContent_eng: It takes over three times as much energy to produce a liter of non-organic milk than a liter of organic milk.
sentences.sCn: 生产一公升的非有机牛奶所需能源，比生产一公升的有机牛奶还要多出三倍以上。

sentences.sContent: Containers must be placed and well-sealed in one transparent plastic bag with a press-seal, of a maximum capacity of one liter (quart).
sentences.sContent_eng: Containers must be placed and well-sealed in one transparent plastic bag with a press-seal, of a maximum capacity of one liter (quart).
sentences.sCn: 这些东西必须被密封放置在一个有冲压密封圈的，最大容量为一公升（一夸脱）的透明塑料袋中。

remMethod.val: meter(米)是长度单位， liter(升)是体积单位
